X.i.6.K.7.e
.
DRAS Responsibility for Preparing Memorandum Rating Decisions
Following receipt of a request for an eligibility determination from an RLC, DRASs must prepare a memorandum rating decision for inclusion in the service member’s eFolder if the
service member’s proposed rating has not been completed yet, and
evidence of record shows the service member is at least 10
-
percent disabled due to an SC disability(ies).
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section K - Special Situations Related to Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES)
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section K
